text: John Neville Creighton (10 March 1937 â€“ 6 April 2022) was a New Zealand rugby union player. He played as a hooker. He played for Canterbury at a provincial level in over 100 games. He also played for the New Zealand national rugby union team making six appearances in 1962. Creighton was born in Rotherham, New Zealand. Creighton died in Christchurch, New Zealand on 6 April 2022 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand rugby union players
title: John Creighton (rugby union)
